description: The MEM_LIST_RIDERS table contains riders associated with capitation transaction member lists.

columns.name: MEM_LIST_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the member list record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: MEMBER_RIDERS_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The riders associated with the transaction's member list.

columns.name: MEMBER_RIDERS_PLAN_ID_BENEFIT_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the benefit plan record.
